title: Speech - Unit 11. I Can't Wait to Get Older

words.definition: to take a child or pet into your home as family
words.sentence: We ___ a dog from the shelter.

words.definition: a place to live in a big building
words.sentence: We moved into a new ___ last month.

words.definition: hair that grows on a man's chin and face
words.sentence: He shaved off his ___ today.

words.definition: to change the color of something, like hair or clothes
words.sentence: I want to ___ my shirt a new color.

words.definition: as much as needed
words.sentence: I didn't have ___ time to finish.

words.definition: a special event with fun, food, or shows
words.sentence: We went to a music ___ last weekend.

words.definition: able to do what you want
words.sentence: I feel ___ when I ride my bike.

words.definition: to become older over time
words.sentence: As we ___, we learn more.

words.definition: to finish school or a program
words.sentence: He ___ from elementary school in June.

words.definition: to become more in size or number
words.sentence: My hair ___ fast in the summer.

words.definition: to create ideas or stories in your thoughts
words.sentence: I ___ a world made of candy.

words.definition: to go and start living in a new place
words.sentence: We will ___ our new house next week.

words.definition: an animal that lives with people
words.sentence: I have a ___ dog named Max.

words.definition: a list of songs to play
words.sentence: I made a ___ for our road trip.

words.definition: to wear clothes or accessories
words.sentence: Please ___ your jacket.

words.definition: a vacation where you travel by car
words.sentence: We took a ___ to the mountains.

words.definition: a belt in a car seat to stop you from falling
words.sentence: Don't forget to wear your ___.

words.definition: a building where people or pets stay when in need
words.sentence: The animal ___ takes care of lost pets.

words.definition: jumping from a plane with a parachute
words.sentence: ___ looks scary but exciting.

words.definition: a school you go to after high school
words.sentence: My cousin studies math at a ___.
